Package com.tcs.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.tcs.controller.AdminController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
REST controller to handle administrative operations. Provides functionality for: - Admin login - Managing underwriters (register, update password, delete, fetch) - Admin logout

  • Method Details

    • login

      @PostMapping("/login") public String login(@RequestBody Login login)
      Endpoint for admin login. Returns JWT if credentials are valid.
      Parameters:
      login - admin login credentials
      Returns:
      JWT token string

    • registerUnderwriter

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @PostMapping("/underwriter/register") public Underwriter registerUnderwriter(@RequestBody Underwriter underwriter, @RequestParam String password)
      Register a new underwriter with a given password. Accessible only by users with ADMIN role.
      Parameters:
      underwriter - underwriter data
      password - password to assign
      Returns:
      registered Underwriter

    • updatePassword

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @PutMapping("/underwriter/{id}/password") public String updatePassword(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String newPassword)
      Update the password of an existing underwriter. Accessible only by ADMIN.
      Parameters:
      id - underwriter ID
      newPassword - new password
      Returns:
      success message

    • deleteUnderwriter

      @DeleteMapping("/underwriter/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUnderwriter(@PathVariable Long id)
      Delete an underwriter by ID. No role restriction (consider adding security here).
      Parameters:
      id - underwriter ID
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • allUnderwriters

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/underwriters") public List<Underwriter> allUnderwriters()
      Get a list of all registered underwriters. Only accessible by ADMIN.
      Returns:
      list of Underwriter entities

    • logout

      @PostMapping("/logout") public String logout()
      Dummy logout endpoint. Instructs the client to remove JWT locally.
      Returns:
      logout message

    • getUnderwriterById

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @GetMapping("/underwriter{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Underwriter> getUnderwriterById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Get a single underwriter by ID. Only accessible by ADMIN.
      Parameters:
      id - underwriter ID
      Returns:
      Underwriter details
